title: Sepp Kuss, guzzling ‘cava,’ and the joy of racing: ‘I wanted to soak this in’
content:
Colorado climbing ace high-fives fans and celebrates victory as he comes within seconds of claiming the overall lead at the Spanish grand tour.

Read the full article at Sepp Kuss, guzzling ‘cava,’ and the joy of racing: ‘I wanted to soak this in’ on Velo.
author: ahood
